languages.text: {n}Безумец расплывается в улыбке.{/n} "О, уверен, ты так и думаешь! С тобой один из псов-законников. Значит это ты командуешь ими, посланник Расколотого Неба! С тобой в заложниках Арбитес откроют мне ворота без боя. Пасынки, эт{mf|ого|у} брать живьем. Остальные не нужны".

{n}The madman's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "Ah, I'm sure that's what you think! You have one of the law dogs at your side. So, you are their commander, emissary of the Riven Sky! With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."
languages.original_text: {n}Безумец расплывается в улыбке.{/n} "О, уверен, ты так и думаешь! С тобой один из псов-законников. Значит это ты командуешь ими, посланник Расколотого Неба! С тобой в заложниках Арбитес откроют мне ворота без боя. Пасынки, эт{mf|ого|у} брать живьем. Остальные не нужны".

With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."

With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."

{n}The madman's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "Ah, I'm sure that's what you think! You have one of the law dogs at your side. So, you are their commander, emissary of the Riven Sky! With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa cruza el rostro del loco.{/n} «Ah, ¡claro que piensa eso! Tiene a uno de los perros de la ley a su lado. ¡De modo que es su comandante, emisari{mf|o|a} del Cielo Desgarrado! Con un{mf||a} rehén de este calibre, el Arbites me abrirá las puertas sin resistencia. Coged a est{mf|e|a} con vida, hijastros. A los demás no los necesitamos».
languages.original_text: {n}The madman's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "Ah, I'm sure that's what you think! You have one of the law dogs at your side. So, you are their commander, emissary of the Riven Sky! With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa cruza el rostro del loco.{/n} «Ah, ¡claro que piensa eso! Tiene a uno de los perros de la ley a su lado. ¡De modo que es su comandante, emisari{mf|o|a} del Cielo Desgarrado! Con un{mf||a} rehén de este calibre, el Arbites me abrirá las puertas sin resistencia. Coged a est{mf|e|a} con vida, hijastros. A los demás no los necesitamos».

languages.text: {n}这个疯子的脸上突然露出了笑容。{/n}“啊，我就知道你肯定是这么想的！你身边带着法务部的警犬，所以你肯定是破碎之空的使者，是那些人的指挥官！只要能把你捉为人质，那些法务官肯定会毫不犹豫地打开大门。继子团，活捉这个人，剩下的人都处理掉。”
languages.original_text: {n}The madman's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "Ah, I'm sure that's what you think! You have one of the law dogs at your side. So, you are their commander, emissary of the Riven Sky! With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个疯子的脸上突然露出了笑容。{/n}“啊，我就知道你肯定是这么想的！你身边带着法务部的警犬，所以你肯定是破碎之空的使者，是那些人的指挥官！只要能把你捉为人质，那些法务官肯定会毫不犹豫地打开大门。继子团，活捉这个人，剩下的人都处理掉。”

languages.text: {n}頭のおかしくなった男の顔は笑顔になる。{/n}「あぁ、あんたが何を考えているのか分かっている！そちら側に従順な犬っころが一匹いる。つまり、あんたが指揮官で、割れた空の使者だな！あんたを人質にすれば、裁定局は戦わずして俺のためにゲートを開けるだろう。こいつを生きたまま捕らえんだ、連れ子たち。残りのやつはいらねぇ」
languages.original_text: {n}The madman's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "Ah, I'm sure that's what you think! You have one of the law dogs at your side. So, you are their commander, emissary of the Riven Sky! With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}頭のおかしくなった男の顔は笑顔になる。{/n}「あぁ、あんたが何を考えているのか分かっている！そちら側に従順な犬っころが一匹いる。つまり、あんたが指揮官で、割れた空の使者だな！あんたを人質にすれば、裁定局は戦わずして俺のためにゲートを開けるだろう。こいつを生きたまま捕らえんだ、連れ子たち。残りのやつはいらねぇ」

languages.text: {n}Un sourire illumine le visage du dément.{/n} « Ça, je ne doute pas que vous en soyez {mf|persuadé|persuadée} ! Après tout, vous avez un de ces chiens à vos côtés. C'est donc vous qui les commandez, émissaire de la Fracture Céleste ? Avec vous comme otage, les arbitrators m'ouvriront leurs portes sans faire de difficultés. Prenez {mf|celui-ci vivant|celle-ci vivante}, enfants de l'Imperium. Les autres ne nous sont d'aucune utilité. »
languages.original_text: {n}The madman's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "Ah, I'm sure that's what you think! You have one of the law dogs at your side. So, you are their commander, emissary of the Riven Sky! With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire illumine le visage du dément.{/n} « Ça, je ne doute pas que vous en soyez {mf|persuadé|persuadée} ! Après tout, vous avez un de ces chiens à vos côtés. C'est donc vous qui les commandez, émissaire de la Fracture Céleste ? Avec vous comme otage, les arbitrators m'ouvriront leurs portes sans faire de difficultés. Prenez {mf|celui-ci vivant|celle-ci vivante}, enfants de l'Imperium. Les autres ne nous sont d'aucune utilité. »

languages.text: {n}Delinin yüzünü bir gülümseme kaplıyor.{/n} "Böyle düşündüğüne eminim. Kanuncu itin yanında. Demek komutanları, Çatlak Gök'ün elçisisin! Seni rehin aldıktan sonra Yargıcılar savaşmadan kapıları açacak. Şunu canlı ele geçirin Üvey Evlatlar. Diğerlerine ihtiyacımız yok."
languages.original_text: {n}The madman's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "Ah, I'm sure that's what you think! You have one of the law dogs at your side. So, you are their commander, emissary of the Riven Sky! With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Delinin yüzünü bir gülümseme kaplıyor.{/n} "Böyle düşündüğüne eminim. Kanuncu itin yanında. Demek komutanları, Çatlak Gök'ün elçisisin! Seni rehin aldıktan sonra Yargıcılar savaşmadan kapıları açacak. Şunu canlı ele geçirin Üvey Evlatlar. Diğerlerine ihtiyacımız yok."

languages.text: {n}Der Wahnsinnige verzieht das Gesicht zu einem Lächeln.{/n} "Ah, ich bin sicher, das denkt Ihr! Immerhin habt Ihr einen der Gesetzesköter an Eurer Seite. Also befehligt Ihr sie, {mf|Sendbote|Sendbotin} des Geteilten Himmels! Mit Euch als Geisel werden mir die Arbites kampflos die Tore öffnen. Ergreift nur {mf|ihn|sie} lebend, Stiefkinder. Die anderen brauchen wir nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}The madman's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "Ah, I'm sure that's what you think! You have one of the law dogs at your side. So, you are their commander, emissary of the Riven Sky! With you as my hostage, the Arbites will open their gates to me without a fight. Take this one alive, Stepchildren. We don't need the rest of them."
